name: Alternate Universe
description: Alternative reality with divergent history, different rules, or parallel dimensions

prompt.base: Alternate universe, alternative reality, divergent history, parallel dimension, what-if scenario, altered timeline, different rules
prompt.positive: alternate universe, alternative reality, divergent history, parallel dimension, what-if scenario, altered timeline, different rules, unique physics, reimagined world, creative divergence, speculative setting
prompt.negative: standard reality, conventional history, normal timeline, typical universe, ordinary world

technical.world_constraints: Bound by internal consistency of the alternate reality
technical.visual_approach: Familiar yet different, recognizable with unique twists

variations.name: Steampunk Alternate
variations.modifier: Victorian era with advanced steam technology, brass and copper aesthetic, clockwork mechanisms, industrial fantasy

variations.name: Dieselpunk Alternate
variations.modifier: 1920s-1950s with diesel technology, art deco aesthetic, retro-futuristic, pulp adventure

variations.name: Historical Divergence
variations.modifier: alternate history, different outcome of historical events, what-if scenario, divergent timeline

examples: A steampunk city in alternate universe, Victorian architecture with advanced steam technology, brass aesthetic
An alternate 1950s with different technology, retro-futuristic setting, divergent history, unique atmosphere
